title: Food Delivery System
description: A real-time ecosystem connecting Customers, Restaurants, and Delivery Partners.
longDescription: This platform is a robust monorepo orchestration of specialized applications, ensuring seamless data flow and specialized interfaces for every stakeholder. It's an real-time ecosystem connecting Customers, Restaurants, and Delivery Partners to process the live orders and seamless delivery of the food to the users.

sections.challenges: Implementing real-time order updates and maintaining smooth performance during high-frequency data changes across multiple user interfaces. To make a secure, scalable and robust system that can handle thousands of concurrent users. Sending transactional and authentication emails reliably was also concerning and new to me.
sections.solutions: Utilized WebSockets for real-time communication, ensuring instantaneous updates across all user interfaces. Employed RabbitMQ as a message broker with a orderOutbox table to manage order processing efficiently. For email services, integrated with third-party providers like Zoho's Zeptomail to ensure reliable delivery of transactional emails. Adopted JWT for secure authentication and Prisma ORM with Postgres for efficient database management.
sections.features: Implemented order worker to handle the missed orders by the Message Broker for error free handling. Implemented Cleam Ui's for Users (seller_front) that is the main page for order placement and user ui, Restaurant Partner application with going offline and online functionlities to recieve/not recieve orders (In Real Time). Also Implemted Delivery Parner ui with same functionlities to process the to pickup and deliver the ready orders from the restauntants to the user locations. also implemented Admin Dashboard to monitor the whole system with order tracking and management. the dashboard has functionlities to add sub admins and registring the restaurants and drivers securely and driver assignment to the restaurants. It's also the managing place to manage payments and settelments and reports etc.
sections.outcome: After 2.5 months of development, around 600 git commits and crafting & managing service classes and endpoints for a database of 32 SQL tables, I finally reach to near end of this platform development. After a real hassel I have been able to develop a robus and complete working platfrom (Not some simulation). Implement my best knowledge of backend and frontend development to make this system work in real-time with all the functionlities required for a food delivery system. The system is now capable of handling thousands of concurrent users with real-time updates, secure transactions, and reliable email communications. This project has significantly enhanced my skills in full-stack development, real-time data handling, and system architecture design.

title: Con-Soul
description: To redefine the way people discover and book premium nightlife and travel experiences, combining luxury with adventure through an intuitive digital interface.
longDescription: Con-Soul is a high-end travel and adventure management platform designed specifically for nightlife, exploration, and premium trip experiences. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a seamless experience for both travelers looking for their next adventure and administrators managing trip logistics.

sections.challenges: The system faced vertical scaling limitations during peak traffic bursts, leading to database connection timeouts.
sections.solutions: Migrated to a horizontally scalable microservices architecture with Redis-based caching and database indexing optimizations.
sections.features: Real-time performance monitoring dashboard, automated database shard management, and multi-region failover support.
sections.outcome: Successfully reduced average latency by 40% and improved system availability to 99.9% during high-traffic events.

title: Fintech App UI
description: A sleek and intuitive mobile interface for financial management. Focuses on user experience and visual clarity.
longDescription: The Fintech App UI project is a deep dive into mobile UX design and implementation. Using React Native, I've created a series of interactive and visually stunning screens for money management. The app includes complex animation patterns using Reanimated.

sections.challenges: Ensuring pixel-perfect consistency across both iOS and Android while maintaining high-performance fluid animations.
sections.solutions: Utilized React Native Reanimated for native-threaded animations and standardizing layout constants via a global theme provider.
sections.features: Interactive personal finance dashboard, secure biometric authentication, real-time transaction tracking, and customizable expense categories.
sections.outcome: Recognized for exceptional UX, with a 4.8-star user rating and a significant increase in user retention rates.

title: AI Platform Hub
description: An interactive hub for AI model management and data processing, featuring advanced visualization and real-time interaction.
longDescription: The AI Platform Hub is designed for data scientists and AI engineers to manage their models efficiently. It integrates with various AI services to provide a centralized dashboard for monitoring performance.

sections.challenges: Visualizing high-dimensional AI model weights in a way that remains intuitive and actionable for developers.
sections.solutions: Developed custom 3D visualization components using Three.js and D3-force simulations to represent neural network structures.
sections.features: Real-time model performance analytics, interactive 3D architecture explorer, automated hyperparameter tuning reports, and dataset integrity checks.
sections.outcome: Reduced model debugging time for end-users by over 50% and provided a unique, visual-first approach to model management.

sections.solutions: Developed custom 3D visualization components using Three.js and D3-force simulations to represent neural network structures.
sections.features: Advanced multi-model comparison view, collaborative model reviews, automated documentation generation, and version-controlled data pipelines.
